overview: When bachelor Walter Davis is set up with his sister-in-law's pretty cousin, Nadia Gates, a seemingly average blind date turns into a chaotic night on the town. Walter's brother, Ted, tells him not to let Nadia drink alcohol, but he dismisses the warning and her behaviour gets increasingly wild. Walter and Nadia's numerous incidents are made even worse as her former lover David relentlessly follows them around town.
tagline: A date with her is every man's dream come true. And with dreams like her - who needs nightmares?
cast: Kim Basinger|Bruce Willis|John Larroquette|William Daniels|George Coe
